<a id="AnimationNodeTimeScale"></a>

# AnimationNodeTimeScale

**Inherits:** [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A time-scaling animation node used in [AnimationTree](AnimationTree.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Allows to scale the speed of the animation (or reverse it) in any child [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md)\\ s. Setting it to ``0.0`` will pause the animation.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

- [Using AnimationTree](../tutorials/animation/animation_tree.md)
